quote: Based on this design of Dilated Transformer, we construct a U-shaped encoder-decoder hierarchical architecture called D-Former for 3D medical image segmentation.
Our proposed D-Former is a 3D U-shaped architecture with hierarchical layers, and employs skip connections from encoder to decoder.
Swin-Unet [53] used the Swin Transformer block as a basic unit to build a U-shape architecture with skip connections.
